ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISCHANGED(StageName), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Bike', TEXT(PRIORVALUE(StageName)) = 'Contract', OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName,'New'), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Test Ride & Negotiation'), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Deposit')), OR($Profile.Name = 'Community Sale Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Community Sale Sup'))
